tool_description: provides real-time information about football matches happening today, including team names, match times, and whether the match has finished or is still ongoing.
name: TodayFootballMatchesAPI
title: TodayFootballMatchesAPI

api_list.name: Real-time Football Match Information Service for Today's Matches
api_list.description: To access real-time information on ongoing football matches scheduled for today .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://todayfootballmatchesapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/getall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "todayfootballmatchesapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://todayfootballmatchesapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/getall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "todayfootballmatchesapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
